channel.title: OpenGL Mathematics (GLM) - Releases
channel.description: Get the updates when new version of GLM are released

item.title: GLM 0.9.8.0 released
item.description: Clip control for Vulkan and D3D compatibility, lot of new packing functions, aligned types, SIMD raw API, improved SIMD support, etc.

item.title: GLM 0.9.7.4 released
item.description: Minor revision fixing many undefined refernece errors, warnings, fixed outerProduct and eulerAngles

item.title: GLM 0.9.7.3 released
item.description: Minor revision fixing CMake warnings, GCC 6.0 detection, fixing Clang build on Windows
